title: Doing 3s, playing Shaco
body:
Get matched with this Jungle Jax
Since this is like level 10 games I'm just trying to get {{item:3087}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3035}} (And some other dmg things) so I can one shot people with my Q auto

And this guy just starts verbally assaulting me over stupid shit. I ask him why he would just randomly walk up and tax 2 minion waves and he gives me this big long speech about how I'm a noob and that objectives are more important than cs and how this is a 2v3 because of me

And so Yas and I try to tell him to calm the fuck down and he just keeps raging about how I'm such a noob and how he's reporting me and how it's 2v3

http://imgur.com/ExRuSxa
